flavorText:
"Did you expect me to dodge? How quaint."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

foreignData.flavorText:
「あたしがよけると思ったのかい？変わってるねぇ。」
――ミストメドウの魔女、オルカ
foreignData.name: 霧への変化
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。次の終了ステップの開始時に、そのカードをオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

name: Turn to Mist
originalText: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

Once the exiled creature returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.

text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
